DOC.HEADLINE: WORLD IN BRIEF ; YEMEN ; NORTHERN TROOPS ADVANCE ON ADEN
DOC.TEXT: Guns boomed east of Aden as northern troops advanced on the southern stronghold on the third day of civil war.Foreigners terrorized by the escalating bloodshed fled Aden and the capital , Sana . The northerners have been trying to cut_off access to vital oil fields and installations controlled by the southerners . Conservative North Yemen merged with socialist South Yemen in May , 1990 , to form the Arab world ' s youngest republic .
